body_html:
No, you only need to conditionally set the #define in the BUILD rule. See the jemalloc example here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl#L194

body:
No, you only need to conditionally set the #define in the BUILD rule. See the jemalloc example here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl#L194
